name: H&R Block 2013 Tax Return
summary: Learn about .T13 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Completed tax returns can be filed electronically directly from the software. They can also printed and mailed to the appropriate tax authorities.
NOTE: Previous versions of H&R Block's tax return software were called "At Home." Tax returns created with At Home 2012 were created with a .T12 file extension.

description: Tax return created with H&R Block 2013 tax software or exported from H&R Block online; contains U.S. federal tax forms for 2013; may also include state tax forms for a specific state; stores personal data and tax information entered by the user.
